result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Z Madlock

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Transcript SENTENCING HEARING, commencing SEPTEMBER 18, 2014, received and filed.  Original transcript in case file 14CF3054 (49 Pages).

Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in court with attorney Christopher Paul Ehrfurth.  Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in custody.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Status conference held.

Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in court with attorney Christopher Paul Ehrfurth.  Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in custody.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed and read-in to case #'s 14CF3054 and 14CF3111 for the purposes of sentencing.  Status conference scheduled for September 18, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Reply to State's Motion to Admit Dominique Burns' Testimonial Statement Under Forfeiture by Wrongdoing received and filed.  ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE.  rmm

Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in court with attorney Christopher Paul Ehrfurth.  Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in custody.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court grants adjourned final pre-trial. Defense motion response is due 08/22/2014.  Case remains calendared in Branch 40.
State's Motion to Admit Dominique Burns' Testimonial Statement Under Forfeiture by Wrongdoing received and filed.  ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE.  rmm

Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in court with attorney Christopher Paul Ehrfurth.  Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in custody.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.

Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in court with attorney Christopher Paul Ehrfurth.  Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in custody.  Ryan T. Sanson appeared Michael Schindhelm for the State of Wisconsin.  
 FILE NOT IN COURT.  Br. 4 for Br. 40: 
 Upon the motion of the State, the Court ordered the following cases consolidated for the purposes of trial: 2014CM722, 2014CF985 and 2013CF3054.  Defendant has another case (2014CF3111) scheduled for a Preliminary Hearing in Branch 40 on 7-30-2014 at 1:30 pm.  

Court ordered case adjourned for Status Hearing in Branch 40 on 7-30-2014 and case mains calendared for Final Pretrial Conference on 8-12-2014 at 1:30 pm and Jury Trial on 9-8-2014 at 8:30 am.   mld
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.

Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in court with attorney Christopher Paul Ehrfurth.  Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in custody.  Michael Thurston for Michael Christopher Schindhelm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Case set for final pretrial conference.  Defendant has picked up a new case.  On motion of the defense, Court vacated the 8/04/14 jury trial.  Court examined the defendant as to his right to a speedy trial and found the defendant freely, voluntarily, knowingly and intelligently waived his right to a speedy trial.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.

Attorney Christopher P Ehrfurth in court, defendant Christopher Z Madlock not in court, in custody.  Matthew Torbenson for Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Pretrial Conference held.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 16, 2014 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for August 4, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 16, 2014 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for August 4, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.

Attorney Christopher P Ehrfurth in court, defendant Christopher Z Madlock not in court, in custody.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Status conference held.  Attorney Ehrfurth has not received discovery and would like a short adjournment.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Status conference scheduled for May 19, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in court with attorney Brian C Hagner.  Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in custody.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Hagner informs court that there has been a breakdown in communication that is irreconcilable.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Attorney is to inform the Public Defender's Office that new counsel needs to be appointed.  Case is adjourned for status of counsel to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Court orders jury trial of 05/19/2014 vacated.  Status conference scheduled for May 9, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.

Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in court with attorney Brian C. Hagner.  Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in custody.  Molly Marie Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. On motion of the state, Court ordered 14CM722 and 14CF985 joined for the purpose of trial.  Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 1, 2014 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for May 19, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Speedy trial demand entered as to Counts 2 & 3.  State argues it should be as to Count 1.  Court to address on the next date.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY  to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Dominique B

Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in court with attorney Louis E. Epps.  Defendant Christopher Z Madlock in custody.  Tyrone Martin St Junior appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Defense entered a plea of NOT GUILTY as to Counts 2 & 3.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 20, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
